channel.title: Free Pass to Criticise
channel.description:
I'm currently giving out free passes to criticise this... thing I've written. Tell me if you at least semi-enjoyed it.
[size=14pt]Before reading it, watch [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/4505535/To/ewarevideo.html]THIS.[/url][/size]
This is supposed to sound similar to the above.
[hr]
Let's just say I have to do this:
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ldnyq.png[/img]
And so far I've done this:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/4505535/Pictures/Everywareness.PNG[/img]
CC

item.title: Free Pass to Criticise
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

[quote=“Not New Here, post:2, topic:437204”]I’m sorry but you went from saying technology governed our lives then proceeded to say not to hold it back, then went on discussing how we’re helping the world meanwhile it’s National Water Day or w/e and nobody is still doing shit

#audacity @ swiftirc[/quote]

You do have a point how I didn’t stick to one idea.
We’re helping the world: the people in the world. I never meant to bring in any Save The Earth.

Read full topic
